primaryTopic.dcSource: Australian Ocean Data Network Organisation Register
primaryTopic.definition: This department became part of the former Department of Environment, Climate Change and Water (DECCW). After 2011, DECCW was broken up with its responsibilities split between the new Office of Environment and Heritage and the residual functions managed by the Industry, Innovation and Investment Division of the Department of Trade and Investment, Regional Infrastructure and Services. (Courtesy of Wikipedia)
